content.rendered:
[vc_row type=”in_container” full_screen_row_position=”middle” scene_position=”center” text_color=”dark” text_align=”left” overlay_strength=”0.3″ shape_divider_position=”bottom”][vc_column column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_position=”all” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” width=”1/1″ tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][vc_video link=”https://youtu.be/vdwqR55TbF8″ align=”center”][vc_column_text]

2019 Fixed Operations Solution Vendor of the Year Dealership News

Back to Back Winner

What does FIXED OPS DIGITAL have planned for 2020?

We are ready for 2020. 2019 was a great year for us, we grew a lot and we expect more growth this year.
Some of the things that we are working on for this year are to really help dealerships with specific strategies and specific challenges, for example recalls just to name one. Recalls are huge. a lot of manufacturers are coming out with different recalls and what we want to do is help the dealers that we work with capture that business from their website, from the internet and be a lot more aggressive in getting some of that recall business. That’s just one of the things we are working on. Obviously we have other things that we are going to do as well for our clients, but we are excited. We are excited for 2020. 2019 Was a soft year for sales and it looks like 2020 might be very similar, but that gives us a huge opportunity in the back of the house on the fixed ops side.
We appreciate the honor Dealership News!
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

@graph.caption: 2019 Dealership News Vendor of The Year

@graph.name: Vendor of The Year - Fixed Ops Digital
Julie Branum
@graph.description: Julie has a decade of experience in the car business and marketing specifically for manufacturer dealerships in the U.S. Utilizing best practices and her background in design, Julie believes in presenting and converting dealerships online visitors into high RO Service and Parts Department customers.
